committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, and title 39, United States Code, to limit the application of certain penalties and prohibitions relating to foreign lotteries.

summary.text: Permits importation, mailing of, and interstate commerce in tickets or equipment concerning lotteries authorized by laws of a foreign country.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, and title 39, United States Code, to limit the application of certain penalties and prohibitions relating to foreign lotteries.
